document_data.name: Steak and Kidney Pie
document_data.mainbody: '''Steak and kidney pie''' was a cheap and simple [[pie]] dish, considered a lighter fare.
document_data.Description: The pie was prepared with diced steak and kidneys, wrapped in a "shield"—a [[Faerûn]]ean term for pastry crust.{{Cite dragon/277/The New Adventures of Volo: Dragonwing Stew|92}}
document_data.Availability:
In the city of [[Waterdeep]], steak and kidney pies were served at the [[Inn of the Dripping Dagger]]. The dish was sold cold and they offered ice-packing and leaf wrappings for travel.

The [[Beldar's Rest]] inn in [[Yartar]], a town in the [[Dessarin Valley]], served simple fare, including steak, kidney, and [[mushroom]] pies, which were popular with adventurers.
